abstract: Profile of Alain E Kaloyeros, one of nine defendants charged in wide-ranging bribery and bid-rigging scheme surrounding Gov Andrew M Cuomo's economic development programs for upstate New York; Kaloyeros' motivations appear to go beyond money, as he sought power and prestige while working to transform Albany from sleepy government town into high-tech research hub.

headline.print_headline: Physicist in Albany Corruption Case Was a Geek With Big Goals
headline.main: Physicist in Albany Corruption Case Was a Geek With Big Goals

snippet: Alain E. Kaloyeros rose from a university laboratory to oversee hundreds of millions of dollars in state economic development funds. Beyond money, the rewards he sought seemed mostly to involve power....
lead_paragraph: Alain E. Kaloyeros rose from a university laboratory to oversee hundreds of millions of dollars in state economic development funds. Beyond money, the rewards he sought seemed mostly to involve power.
